block.comment: ENV list: 1- level of execution: 0: global variables 1: main variables 2 on: local variables 2- function result 3- starting state (init) 4- started state (global) 5- running state (main) 6- already started state ( 7- function argument pointer 8- argument type (constInt/varInt) 9- exec return
